repos.name: Gator_taxi_Advanced_data_struc
repos.description: GatorTaxi is a ride-sharing system that efficiently manages ride requests using a Red-Black Tree (RBT) and Min-Heap. The system supports inserting, updating, querying, and canceling rides, ensuring fast operations. With O(log n) complexity, it handles up to 2000 active rides, offering optimal performance for real-time ride management.
